attributes.action: Make ROY WOOD Honored with Knighthood for his contribution to music & Charities
attributes.additional_details: ROY WOOD IS A UNIQUE ENIGMA HIGHLY TALENTED MULTI INSTRUMENTALIST, COMPOSER PRODUCER ARTIST & CHAMPION FOR GOOD CAUSES
attributes.background: 50 years after he launched his brain child Electric Light Orchestra with Jeff Lynne and his subsequent hits with Wizzard this Doctor and Ivor Novello award winning songwriter who was inducted into the Rock and Roll hall of fame in 2017~Life long devotion to good causes esp B/ham children's Hospital

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given an honour.

You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
